Question: Identify the titles and scores of answers provided by users who commented on questions tagged with 'Java' with a view count exceeding 1000.
Cypher:
MATCH (javaTag:Tag)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(question:Question)<-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)<-[commented:COMMENTED]-(user:User)
MATCH (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)
WHERE javaTag.name="Java" AND question.view_count>1000
RETURN tagged, javaTag, question, commentedOn, comment, commented, user, provided, answer, answer.title, answer.score
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (javaTag:Tag)-[tagged:TAGGED]-(question:Question)<-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)<-[commented:COMMENTED]-(user:User)
MATCH (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)
WHERE javaTag.name="Java" AND question.view_count>1000
RETURN tagged, javaTag, question, commentedOn, comment, commented, user, provided, answer, answer.title, answer.score
Rewrite: Find the titles and scores of responses from users who have commented on questions labeled 'Java' that have more than 1000 views.

Question: Can you find the display names of users who have both answered and commented on questions tagged with 'javascript' and 'react' with answer scores greater than 20?
Cypher:
MATCH (commentUser:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)-[taggedJS:TAGGED]->(tagJS:Tag),
      (answerUser:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question),
      (question)-[taggedReact:TAGGED]->(tagReact:Tag)
WHERE tagJS.name="javascript" AND tagReact.name="react" AND answer.score > 20 AND commentUser.uuid = answerUser.uuid
RETURN commented, commentUser, comment, commentedOn, question, taggedJS, tagJS, provided, answerUser, answer, answered, taggedReact, tagReact, commentUser.display_name
Semantic-EQL-Question: Who are the users who commented on and provided answers to questions tagged with both "javascript" and "react", where the answers have scores above 20?
Rewrite: Could you retrieve the display names of users who have commented on and answered questions tagged 'javascript' and 'react', where their answers have scores over 20?

Question: What are the links and body_markdown of questions asked by users who have provided accepted answers to questions tagged 'database' and answered other questions with a score higher than 50?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(acceptedAnswer:Answer)-[answeredAccepted:ANSWERED]->(questionWithTag:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE acceptedAnswer.is_accepted = true AND tag.name = "database"
MATCH (user)-[providedHighScore:PROVIDED]->(highScoreAnswer:Answer)-[answeredHighScore:ANSWERED]->(otherQuestion:Question)
WHERE highScoreAnswer.score > 50
MATCH (user)-[asked:ASKED]->(userQuestion:Question)
RETURN provided, user, acceptedAnswer, answeredAccepted, questionWithTag, tagged, tag, providedHighScore, highScoreAnswer, answeredHighScore, otherQuestion, asked, userQuestion, userQuestion.link, userQuestion.body_markdown
Semantic-EQL-Question: Who are the users that have provided accepted answers to questions tagged "database", also contributing answers with scores over 50, and what are the questions they've asked along with these questions' links and markdown bodies?
Rewrite: What are the URLs and body_markdown of questions posted by users who have supplied accepted answers to questions with a 'database' tag and have also responded to other questions with scores exceeding 50?

Question: Extract and list all user display names and the titles of questions they have commented on, given that these questions are related to the 'python' tag and have at least 5 comments with individual scores over 10.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "python" AND comment.score > 10
WITH question, count(comment) as HighScoringComments, user
WHERE HighScoringComments >= 5
RETURN commented, user, comment, commentedOn, question, tagged, tag, user.display_name, question.title

Question: Can you gather names of users, titles, and links of questions which they have tagged as 'SQL' or 'NoSQL' where these questions also have an accepted answer and more than 1500 views?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE (tag.name="SQL" OR tag.name="NoSQL") AND question.accepted_answer_id IS NOT NULL AND question.view_count>1500
RETURN asked, user, question, tagged, tag, user.display_name, question.title, question.link
Rewrite: Could you collect the names of users, titles, and URLs of questions tagged with 'SQL' or 'NoSQL' that have an accepted answer and over 1500 views?

Question: Display the uuids of users who have comments on answers to their own questions that contain the tags 'algorithm' and 'data structure', ensuring these question have accrued over 300 views.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged1:TAGGED]->(tag1:Tag), (question)-[tagged2:TAGGED]->(tag2:Tag)
MATCH (question)<-[:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)<-[:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)<-[:COMMENTED]-(user)
WHERE tag1.name="algorithm" AND tag2.name="data structure" AND question.view_count>300
RETURN asked, user, question, tagged1, tag1, tagged2, tag2, answer, comment, user.uuid
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged1:TAGGED]->(tag1:Tag), (question)-[tagged2:TAGGED]->(tag2:Tag)
MATCH (question)<-[relation9:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)<-[relation10:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)<-[relation11:COMMENTED]-(user)
WHERE tag1.name="algorithm" AND tag2.name="data structure" AND question.view_count>300
RETURN relation11, relation10, relation9, asked, user, question, tagged1, tag1, tagged2, tag2, answer, comment, user.uuid
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you identify users who posted and commented on answers to their own questions tagged as both "algorithm" and "data structure", provided these questions have attracted over 300 views?

Question: Can you detail the relationships between answers and questions where the answers have scores over 15 and are attached to questions tagged with 'PHP' and 'security'?
Cypher:
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[providedToQuestion:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[taggedAsPHP:TAGGED]->(tagPHP:Tag),
(question)-[taggedAsSecurity:TAGGED]->(tagSecurity:Tag)
WHERE answer.score > 15 AND tagPHP.name="PHP" AND tagSecurity.name="security"
RETURN providedToQuestion, answer, question, taggedAsPHP, tagPHP, taggedAsSecurity, tagSecurity, answer.uuid, question.uuid
Rewrite: Could you describe the connections between questions and their answers, specifically for answers scoring above 15, linked to questions labeled with the tags 'PHP' and 'security'?

Question: What are the relationships involving comments with a score above 20 on questions concerning the 'machine learning' tag asked by users with more than 10 comments?
Cypher:
MATCH (commenter:User)-[commentRelation:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
MATCH (question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="machine learning" AND comment.score > 20 AND size((commenter)-[:COMMENTED]->(:Comment)) > 10
RETURN commentRelation, commenter, comment, commentedOn, question, tagged, tag, commenter.display_name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (commenter:User)-[commentRelation:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
MATCH (question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="machine learning" AND comment.score > 20 AND size((commenter)-[:COMMENTED]->(node4:Comment)) > 10
RETURN relation8, node4, commentRelation, commenter, comment, commentedOn, question, tagged, tag, commenter.display_name

Question: Identify and describe the connections between users and questions where the users have both asked and provided answers, with each answer having a score exceeding 30 in topics related to 'networking'.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag),
      (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE tag.name="networking" AND answer.score > 30
RETURN asked, provided, answered, tagged, user, question, answer, tag, user.display_name, question.title, answer.title
Rewrite: Determine and elucidate the relationships between users and questions in which the users have both posed questions and given answers, with each answer receiving a score above 30 in areas concerning 'networking'.

Question: List the flow of interactions in terms of comments and answers between questions tagged 'C++' and users who have both commented on and answered these questions, where the comments have scores higher than 5.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag),
      (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
WHERE tag.name="C++" AND comment.score > 5
RETURN provided, answered, tagged, commented, commentedOn, user, answer, comment, question, tag, user.display_name, answer.link, comment.link, question.link, tag.name
Rewrite: Detail the sequence of responses and discussions relating to questions labeled 'C++', involving users who have both commented on and responded to these questions, specifically where the comments hold a score exceeding 5.

Question: Explain the relationship paths from users to their commented questions and answers on those questions for users who have more than 200 comments overall in the graph.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WITH user, COUNT(comment) AS totalComments
WHERE totalComments > 200
MATCH (user)-[commented]->(comment)-[commentedOn]->(question)<-[answered:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)
RETURN commented, user, comment, commentedOn, question, answered, answer, user.uuid, user.display_name, question.uuid, question.title, answer.uuid, answer.title
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (commentingUser:User)-[commentRelation:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOnQuestion:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WITH commentingUser, COUNT(comment) AS totalComments
WHERE totalComments > 200
MATCH (commentingUser)-[anotherCommentRelation:COMMENTED]->(anotherComment:Comment)-[commentedOnAnotherQuestion:COMMENTED_ON]->(sameQuestion:Question)
MATCH (sameQuestion)-[answerRelation:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)
RETURN commentRelation, commentingUser, comment, commentedOnQuestion, question, anotherCommentRelation, anotherComment, commentedOnAnotherQuestion, sameQuestion, answerRelation, answer
Rewrite: Describe the connection routes from users to the questions they have commented on, including the answers to those questions, for users who have accumulated over 200 comments in total within the graph.

Question: Outline the linkage between the questions tagged 'web development' that have at least 200 views and the users who have commented while providing answers to these questions where answer scores were over 25.
Cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag) 
WHERE tag.name="web development" AND question.view_count>=200
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE answer.score > 25
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer)
MATCH (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commented_on:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN tagged, question, tag, answered, answer, provided, user, commented, comment, commented_on, user.display_name
Rewrite: Map the connection between questions labeled 'web development' with a minimum of 200 views and users who commented while offering answers to these questions, specifically where the answers scored above 25.

Question: Calculate the average score of comments made by users who have also answered questions tagged 'Python' where their answers were accepted and scored more than 50.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "Python" AND answer.is_accepted = TRUE AND answer.score > 50
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)
RETURN AVG(comment.score) AS average_comment_score
Rewrite: Determine the mean score of remarks from users who have provided accepted answers scoring over 50 to questions tagged 'Python'.

Question: What is the maximum view count of questions that have been both asked by a user and commented on by the same user where questions carry the tag 'iOS'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="iOS"
WITH user, question
MATCH (user)-[:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN MAX(question.view_count)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="iOS"
WITH user, question
MATCH (user)-[relation6:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[relation7:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN MAX(question.view_count)
Rewrite: What is the highest number of views for questions tagged 'iOS' that a user has both posted and commented on?

Question: Can you compute the total number of comments on questions asked by users who have provided answers with a score of at least 40 to 'Javascript' tagged questions?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "Javascript" AND answer.score >= 40
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[:ASKED]->(askedQuestion:Question)<-[:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)
RETURN COUNT(comment) AS totalComments
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation6:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation7:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[relation8:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "Javascript" AND answer.score >= 40
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[relation9:ASKED]->(askedQuestion:Question)<-[relation10:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)
RETURN COUNT(comment) AS totalComments
Rewrite: Could you calculate the total amount of comments on questions posted by users who have contributed answers scoring 40 or more to questions tagged 'Javascript'?

Question: Determine the minimum and maximum scores of answers to questions tagged with 'artificial intelligence', asked by top 10 users in terms of total questions asked on the platform.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "artificial intelligence"
WITH user, COUNT(question) AS total_questions
ORDER BY total_questions DESC
LIMIT 10
MATCH (user)-[:ASKED]->(question)-[:ANSWERED]->(answer:Answer)
RETURN MIN(answer.score) AS MinScore, MAX(answer.score) AS MaxScore
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "artificial intelligence"
WITH user, COUNT(question) AS total_questions
ORDER BY total_questions DESC
LIMIT 10
MATCH (user)-[relation6:ASKED]->(question)-[relation7:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)
RETURN MIN(answer.score) AS MinScore, MAX(answer.score) AS MaxScore
Rewrite: Identify the lowest and highest scores of responses to questions labeled 'artificial intelligence', posed by the top 10 users ranked by the number of questions they have asked on the platform.

Question: Find the sum of scores of all answers linked to 'Android' tagged questions, provided by users who have comments with scores exceeding 15.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.score > 15
WITH user
MATCH (user)-[:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name='Android'
RETURN SUM(answer.score)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation5:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.score > 15
WITH user
MATCH (user)-[relation6:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation7:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[relation8:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name='Android'
RETURN SUM(answer.score)
Rewrite: Calculate the total score of answers connected to questions tagged 'Android', from users whose comments have scores greater than 15.

Question: Identify the total number of tags associated with questions which have more than 3 answers, each with a score greater than 10, asked by users with uuids more than 50000.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE user.uuid > 50000 AND question.answer_count > 3
WITH question, tag
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE answer.score > 10
WITH question, tag, COUNT(answer) AS answersWithHighScore
WHERE answersWithHighScore > 3
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT tag)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[relation5:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE user.uuid > 50000 AND question.answer_count > 3
WITH question, tag
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[relation6:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE answer.score > 10
WITH question, tag, COUNT(answer) AS answersWithHighScore
WHERE answersWithHighScore > 3
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT tag)
Rewrite: Determine how many tags are linked to questions that receive over three answers, each with scores above 10, posed by users whose uuids exceed 50000.
